attributes.action: Hand control of HMP Oakwood over to NOMS
attributes.additional_details: HMP Oakwood has suffered repeated issues and the company controlling it (G4S) are making a mess of it as they have with other government contracts.  The dedicated staff there are trying their best to be successful but with a profit driven company in charge they have no chance.  It's time to admit as they have with the South Yorkshire cluster and HMP Wolds that it's ownership should be returned to public control.  Termination of the contract and return to public control should commence immediately.
